original_text: And now go to; I will tell you what I will do to my vineyard: I will take away the hedge thereof, and it shall be eaten up; and break down the wall thereof, and it shall be trodden down:
korean_text: 이제 내가 내 포도원에 어떻게 행할지를 너희에게 이르리라 내가 그 울타리를 걷어 먹힘을 당하게 하며 그 담을 헐어 짓밟히게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: what I will do to my vineyard
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 포도원에 무엇을 할 것인지를

sentences.original_text: I will take away the hedge thereof
and it shall be eaten up
and break down the wall thereof
and it shall be trodden down
